file_content.text: The Dark Heart holds many more secrets. I protect the Voss who enter.
Few return from the Dark Heart. Tread carefully, outsider.
Return to Voss-Ka. Laryn-Ki waits for you.
Laryn-Ki sent you here to follow Jokull's path. You are ready to enter the Dark Heart.
The Gormak king came here alone. We tracked him from Gorma-Koss into the Nightmare Lands.
There are many caves in the Dark Heart. Jokull entered the foulest--the Dark Hollow.
Was he looking for something? Or just exploring?
Jokull went in for a reason.
We know this much--he did not seek his power.
What makes the Dark Hollow so dangerous?
What will I find inside?
I completed the ritual. The Dark Hollow can't harm me.
Foulness doesn't scare me.
Madness is not the only danger.
The Dark Hollow is home to an ancient evil. All are drawn and lost to it.
Voss, Gormak, outsiders, beasts... if they still live, they will attack you.
I'll find out how Jokull got his visions, no matter who I have to face.
They won't stop me.
The Mystics chose well.
Perhaps I can cure their madness.
I'll try to help them.
They are lost. Focus on Jokull's path.
I hate fighting my own, even if they are crazy.
Any Republic outsiders?
Do not sorrow. Death will be a relief to them.
Shooting first might be doing them a favor.
Better dead than crazy.
There is no path back from madness.
I appreciate the warning.
You will defeat the Gormak. You must survive.
Bigger fight, bigger win.
You are either brave, or a fool.
The Dark Hollow gave Jokull his power. Find the source.
I'm looking for Talan-De. I need protection against the Nightmare Lands.
Laryn-Ki sent word. You follow the Gormak's path.
Be certain of your need. You risk your life to enter.
I've completed Ki-Da's ritual. The Voss are cleansed.
Few outsiders heed my warnings. You are better.
You have strength. The Nightmare Lands cannot harm you.
You enter alone. War rages in Gorma-Koss. I protect the Voss first.
The Nightmare Lands await. Do what you must.
Complete the ritual or you will go mad.
Stop there. This is no place for outsiders.
The Nightmare Lands have been since the dawn of Voss. They hold many secrets.
Enter lightly, and you will be lost to madness.
What will happen to me if I enter the Nightmare Lands unprotected?
Can you be more specific?
Voss forget who they are. They run with beasts and hunt their own.
You know a lot about surviving down here. Why haven't you gone crazy?
You don't seem too lost.
I do as I am told.
I've seen harsh conditions before. I won't lose my head.
Don't worry about me.
Your mind is the battlefield. Rarely does the darkness lose.
So I get a little loopy. Might be fun.
Madness is no big deal.
You will die.
There must be some way to resist the Nightmare Lands' effects.
How can I protect myself?
You're underestimating me.
We have lost many Voss. You are no better.
The Mystic Ki-Da created a ritual of cleansing. It is our only protection.
If you hope to survive the Nightmare Lands, you must complete Ki-Da's ritual.
Will a Voss ritual work on an outsider?
But I'm not a Voss.
It will protect you from madness. Death is another matter.
How do I do that?
If I really have to.
You will need a dark crystal. Several grow in caves throughout the Nightmare Lands.
Deadly vorantiki have made the caves their home. Defeat these beasts to reach the crystals.
Use the crystal to cleanse the corrupted. It will trap the darkness that drives them mad.
How will I know who needs to be cleansed?
Who are the corrupted?
The corrupted wander blind. They will attack. Be quick.
What do I do with this handful of darkness?
Okay... and then what?
Won't this crystal keep me safe on its own?
Why bother with the rest?
Others have said so before. They died.
After the corrupted have been cleansed, take the crystal to the ruins nearby.
Place the crystal before the ancient tablets. Meditate.
You will gain Ki-Da's wisdom. The darkness will no longer harm you.
Find the crystal, use it on the corrupted, take it to the ruins and meditate.
Let's review.
Piece of cake.
If you return corrupted, I will end your misery.
Follow Ki-Da's ritual. Only then will you be safe.
I don't need your rituals to protect me.
I'll be fine. [Refuse quest]
If you are lost, I cannot save you. Be warned.
You are a fool to come here. Return to Voss-Ka.
Your Republic insists they can help Voss. Only you have shown this.
Find your ambassador. He will need your help.
We battle the Gormak. I will waste no time on you.
